body:
Hello!
  I have been on Avicus for a little over a year. Since I haven't done one yet you may Ask me Anything. I will do my best to answer! :)
body_tagged:

  I have been on Avicus for a little over a year. Since I haven't done one yet you may Ask me Anything. I will do my best to answer! :)
title: [AMA] 1 Year AMA

replies.body:
What's your favorite type of music?
What color shirt are you wearing?
What's your favorite part of Avicus? :)

What colour shirt are u wearing? Orange polo shirt. About to go out for dinner :)
